name: TechFly
description: Manufacturing website of computer and laptop parts. Featured with user and admin dashboard and alsp payment system for users.
technology: HTML, CSS, Tailwind, React, Firebase, Stripe, Node, MongoDB, Express
features1: Single page application website with admin and user dashboard.
features2: Users can buy products, make payment and add a review. Admin can manage all products and orders by adding or deleting.
features3: Both user and admin can see their profile and also update their profile.

name: Vintage Exotic Cars
description: Vintage Exotic Cars is a warehouse management website. Users can maintain stock and also add or delete any product.
technology: HTML, CSS, Tailwind, React, Firebase, Node, MongoDB, Express
features1: A car website where users can add more products.
features2: Users can update the stock of a product through an input field.
features3: Delete button for users to delete any items.

name: Wedding Photographer
description: Website of a weeding photographer. Featured with her services and amazing photo gallery.
features1: Used React router to route page without reloading.
features2: Firebase authenticated signup and login system for users
features3: Animation added when hovering in the photo gallery.
